channel.title: Summoning, Auto Donation and NPC Option Dialogue
channel.description:
Okay, My base is ErasedPkz and when I downloaded it it had summoning already in it but when I go into the summoning file to see how it works it tells me to use the item needed with the pouch but that doesn't do anything.
Second problem; Auto donation. I got a tut for an auto donation system off R-S and I added everything in, compiled and got no errors, but whenever someone logs out it gives me an exception error in the run console. I think i added the logout methods to the wrong place. if you want me to post my runtime errors or a link to the tut i will.
last of all; i'm trying to add an NPC that tells you all about everything you need to know. I know this is sort of asking for someone to spoon feel but i've added things in so much and compiled and they haven't worked for me so im asking someone if they could write out the code for me and tell me where to add it the dialogueAction == 14 and the two dialogue cases are 52 and 54, I'm 100% sure it goes in clicking buttons but i dont know what cases to add it under.

item.title: Summoning, Auto Donation and NPC Option Dialogue
item.dc:creator: @nsfpure nsfpure
item.description:
@nsfpure wrote:

Okay, My base is ErasedPkz and when I downloaded it it had summoning already in it but when I go into the summoning file to see how it works it tells me to use the item needed with the pouch but that doesn’t do anything.

Second problem; Auto donation. I got a tut for an auto donation system off R-S and I added everything in, compiled and got no errors, but whenever someone logs out it gives me an exception error in the run console. I think i added the logout methods to the wrong place. if you want me to post my runtime errors or a link to the tut i will.

last of all; i’m trying to add an NPC that tells you all about everything you need to know. I know this is sort of asking for someone to spoon feel but i’ve added things in so much and compiled and they haven’t worked for me so im asking someone if they could write out the code for me and tell me where to add it
the dialogueAction == 14 and the two dialogue cases are 52 and 54, I’m 100% sure it goes in clicking buttons but i dont know what cases to add it under.
